name: AVCaptureSynchronizedSampleBufferData
desc: A container for video or audio samples collected using synchronized capture.

items.name: var sampleBuffer: CMSampleBuffer
items.desc: The depth data captured at this synchronization point.

items.name: var sampleBufferWasDropped: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether sample buffers were discarded between capture and processing.

items.name: var droppedReason: AVCaptureOutput.DataDroppedReason
items.desc: A value indicating why the capture output failed to deliver sample buffers, if applicable.
